title: How does philosophy help in sports? - Quora

response.answer_text: It helps you analyze what the patterns the other teams have and what each individual player is going to do. When my son played Safety, I told him to watch the receivers in the Huddle and notice whom the quarterback talked to and how the receivers left the huddle. Those that hustled out tended to be the primary receiver and those who took their time were not. Likewise notice how the offensive line placed their weight and their hands to see which way they were going to go. Not a perfect system but it mainly worked.

Philosophy of sport is an area of philosophy that seeks to conceptually analyze issues of sport as human activity. ... A philosophical perspective on sports incorporates its metaphysical relationships with art and play, ethical issues of virtue and fairness and more broadly sociopolitical.
